title: Knockin’ On Heaven’s Door
lyrics:
[intro]
(G) (D) (Am) (Am)
(G) (D) (C) (C)
 
(G) Mamma (D)take this badge off of (Am)me
(G) I can't (D)use it anymo(C)re
(G) It's getting (D)dark, too dark to (Am)see
(G) Feels like I'm (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
 
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
 
(G) Mama, (D)put my guns in the (Am)ground
(G) I can't (D)shoot them anymo(C)re
(G) That cold black (D)cloud is coming (Am)down
(G) Feels like I'm (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
 
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
 
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (Am)door
(G) Knock knock (D)knocking on heaven's (C)door [end]
